__NOTOC__{{codepointer|Status change}} bool '''A_Morph''' (class<Actor> ''type'' [, int ''duration'' [, int ''flags'' [, class<Actor> ''enter_flash'' [, class<Actor> ''exit_flash'']]]])
==Usage== Morphs the calling actor into the specified actor class. For more information, see {{c|[[MorphActor]]}} and {{c|{{Class|MorphProjectile}}}}.
===Parameters=== *''type'': The type of actor class to morph to. *''duration'': The time in [[tics]] for how long to stay morphed. Default is 0, which is interpreted as 1400 tics (40 seconds). *''flags'': Defines the behaviour of the morphing effect. See {{c|{{Property|MorphProjectile.MorphStyle}}}} property for the available flags. Default is 0. *''enter_flash'': Defines the effect flash actor to spawn when morphing. If omitted or is {{c|null}}, the game's default {{Class|TeleportFog|teleport fog}} is used. Default is {{c|null}}. *''exit_flash'': Defines the effect flash actor to spawn when unmorphing. If omitted or is {{c|null}}, the game's default teleport fog is used. Default is {{c|null}}.
===Return value=== The function returns ''true'' if the morph was successful, otherwise it returns ''false''.
== Examples == {{noexamples}}
